name: Runner 51
description:
Runner 51

This is the project that we made for our university Team Software Engineering module.

Its a 2D platforming game.

Controls:

A/D - Move left and right

SPACE - Jump

Esc - Pause

Developers:

Finley Carmichael, Caleb Zekeri, Joe Stallwood,Alexander Reynolds, Paul Parkes, Ryan Brewer
